programme.title: The Jack Bull
programme.desc: A Wyoming horse trader (John Cusack) clashes with a rancher (L.Q. Jones) who abused his horses and their Indian caretaker.

programme.title: Gold of the Seven Saints
programme.desc: Two trappers (Clint Walker, Roger Moore) are chased through treacherous terrain by bad guys who want their gold.

programme.title: The Night of the Grizzly
programme.desc: A lawman (Clint Walker) turns rancher with his wife (Martha Hyer) and family, facing a bad neighbor (Keenan Wynn) and a bear killing livestock.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene must apprehend a group of outlaws harassing Pat as he tries to operate a dry-goods store.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene solves the mystery behind a number of knife murders, including that of Pat's employer.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Pat gets himself a mail-order sweetheart who is more than he can handle.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: A headstrong woman sheriff is intent upon arresting Gene, unaware that he is a lawman.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Trailing desperadoes, Gene and Pat are led to a shack where a woman is hiding them and frightening off pursuers.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Sheriff Gene uncovers the identity of a safecracker with the help of his deputy's telescope.

programme.title: Gun Glory
programme.desc: An ex-gunslinger (Stewart Granger) shunned by townsfolk is the only one who knows how to stop a ruthless cattleman.

programme.title: Red River Range
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers (John Wayne, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune) catch cattle rustlers who use refrigerated trucks.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) tries to tame his wife (Maureen O'Hara) amid a feud with settlers and trouble with Indians.

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: A Union colonel (John Wayne) with a herd of cattle crosses paths with an ex-Confederate colonel's (Rock Hudson) gang in Mexico.

programme.title: The Train Robbers
programme.desc: A proud widow hires a Civil War veteran to help recover the gold her late husband stole from Wells Fargo.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (John Wayne) and a fugitive gambler (Stuart Whitman) stop white renegades running guns and liquor.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteader's wife and her son back to safety after her husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, he stays on to help and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.
